title: 02/21/22 DPS Hour 3 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason McIntyre Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 02/21/22 DPS Hour 3 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason McIntyre Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and Jason debate what the biggest news from the sports weekend was, settling on the melee in Wisconsin between the Wolverines and the Badgers Sunday. FOX Sports NFL analyst Mark Schlereth joins the guys to talk about Tom Brady v Bruce Arians and what it would take for the Denver Broncos to get Aaron Rodgers. Doug and Jason get into the comments made by Lebron James over the weekend about a return to Cleveland.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
